patterns: What is the buffer time available for punch ?
responses: Buffer time for punch in shall be five minutes (Max 09.05am) & punch out shall be five minutes (Min 5.55pm)

patterns: What are the  Norms for Mispunch?
responses: If an employee forgets to punch the access card in the morning or in the afternoon session or the whole day. It cannot be allowed more than three times a month.

patterns: How many hours is the permission considered ?
How many hours permission is available in a month ?
responses: Permission will be allowed only in the first two hours(9 to 11am) or last two hours (4 to 6pm)

patterns: How many permissions can be taken in a month  ?
How many permissions are available in a month
responses: Maximum two permissions allowed in a month

patterns: What are the Norms for Permission?
responses: Permissions are available month wise. Max two permissions allowed in a month (Probability – PX,PX – XP,XP – PX,XP, - XP,PX).If goes beyond 2 times, the remaining will be considered as LOP.Permission will be allowed only in the first two hours(9 to 11am) or last two hours (4 to 6pm).

patterns: What is the trainee leave policy of company?
What are the Norms for Trainee Leave?
responses: Trainees will be given a leave of 12 days in a year on pro-rata basis. Any employee whose designation is trainee can avail trainee leave but not any other leave type.Permission cannot be availed.

patterns: What is the Maternity leave policy leave in the company
How many days of maternity leave?
How many months you will provide maternity leave?
Explain Maternity leave policy of company
How many months is considered for maternity leave
responses: Any employee who has worked more than 80 days is eligible for Maternity Leave. Maximum 24 Weeks can be availed per approval.Can be clubbed with balance PL only.

patterns: What are the Norms for Condolence Leave?
What is the condolence leave policy leave of company ?
Explain condolence leave policy of company
responses: Only 3 days of CONL will be provided for an employee. Minimum 1 day & Maximum 3 days can be availed per approval. Can be clubbed with Privilege leave.

patterns: What is the privilege leave policy of company?
What are the Norms of Privilege Leave?
responses: Only 24 days of PL will be provided for an employee worrking at Head Office and only 15 days for an employees working at Plant. PL will be provided on Pro-rata basis for Probationers and then after confirmation balance leave will be credited (till Mar). Minimum 2 days & Maximum 24 days can be availed per approval.Cannot be clubbed with any leaves / Comp-Off.Condition like 4th-PL,5th -FH/NH,6th-PL is acceptable and 4th-PL,5th -FH/NH,6th-PL is not acceptable

patterns: What are the Norms for Sick Leave?
responses: Only 6 days of SL will be provided for an employee. SL will be provided on Pro-rata basis for Probationers and then after confirmation balance leave will be credited (till Mar).Minimum 0.5 day & Maximum 6 days can be availed per approval.If more than 2 days, Medial certificate upload is mandatory.Condition like 4th-SL,5th -FH/NH,6th-SL is acceptable and 4th-SL,5th -FH/NH,6th-CL is not acceptable

patterns: How many days casual leave available?
How many casual leaves can be taken in a year ?
How many casual leaves can be taken ?
responses: Only 6 days of CL will be provided for an employee. Minimum 0.5 day & Maximum 2 days can be availed per approval

patterns: What are the Norms for Casual Leave ?
What is the casual leave policy of company?
responses: Only 6 days of CL will be provided for an employee. CL will be provided on Pro-rata basis for Probationers and then after confirmation balance leave will be credited (till Mar). Minimum 0.5 day & Maximum 2 days can be availed per approval. If CL is exceeding more than 2 continuously then all 3 days will be considered as PL.Cannot be clubbed with any leaves / Comp-Off.Condition like 4th-CL,5th -FH/NH,6th-CL is acceptable and 4th-CL,5th -FH/NH,6th-SL is not acceptable

patterns: Will I be paid fully when I am under injury leave
What is the injury leave policy of company ?
responses: If a permanent employee is injured in any accident in the course of his /her duties resulting in his /her temporary incapacity or disablement, he/ she shall be entitled to leave without pay over and above his / her entitled leaves, till he /she fully recovers to the satisfaction of Doctors of the Company, whose opinion shall be final

patterns: How can I avail restricted holidays ?
Should I inform prior to my eligible restricted holiday ?
responses: Employees are eligible to avail 2 (two) days Restricted Holidays in a year. Employees should apply prior to availing the Restricted Holidays

patterns: Should I produce medical certificate for sick leaves ?
Do I need to submit medical certificate for sick leave ?
When to submit medical certificate for sick leave?
responses: An employee who avails sick leave for more than two (2) days continuously is required to submit a medical certificate issued by the Registered Medical Practitioner stating the illness on account of which the employee was unable to attend the duties.

intents.tag: norms for pre compoff and post comp off
patterns: norms for pre comp off and post comp off
What is the compoff policy of company
Norms for pre compoff and post compoff
responses: Any employee will be eligible for Compensatory off in case they work for a half day (Minimum 4 hrs) on their weekly off / any declared holiday (with the approval of their Immediate Manager). Such Compensatory Off shall be availed within 2 months of their working on their weekly off with the approval of their Head of the Division. Compensatory Off can be clubbed with any leave but not with permissions in the same day.
